description: {"blocks":[{"key":"djjd","text":"This protocol contains a detail description of how to perform immunostaining on two different cell types, U2OS and iPSCs cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7q4t","text":"It also describes how to perform live-cell imaging procedure using a Zeiss LSM900 confocal microscope in a temperature-controlled environment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
